How We Build

A simple loop: research, build, ship — then repeat.

1

Research

We identify underserved niches and real operator pain points in micro-SaaS markets.

2

Build

MVP Studio & MVP Labs prototype fast using AI-assisted development and strict minimalism.

3

Ship

We deploy live tools here and list the proven ones on trusted marketplaces.

Inside MVP House

We are a venture studio.

MVP House is a small, focused team that builds micro-SaaS apps, automation tools, and AI-driven utilities. We ship fast, keep things minimal, and treat every app like a tiny product with real users and real outcomes.

  • •Micro-SaaS factory mindset
  • •AI-first development pipelines
  • •Fast shipping culture
  • •Multi-domain ecosystem: mvphouse.io, mvphouse.dev, mvphouse.app

Studio Snapshot

MVP Studio & Labs

30+ experiments / year · Multi-time marketplace exits · Operators first.

Focus

Micro-SaaS · AI · Automation

Stack

Next.js · Edge · Internal APIs

Our Philosophy

Principles that guide how we build, launch, and sell micro-SaaS.

Ship Fast

Short build cycles, rapid iteration, and constant learning from real usage.

AI-Native

We treat AI as a core building block, not an afterthought.

Minimal & Purposeful

No bloat — just focused tools that solve specific problems.
